step_feedback.feedback: You're doing a great job sitting or standing comfortably. Try to focus on tightening your whole body muscles as you inhale, imagining the fluid moving towards your chest.
Placing your hands on your abdomen is perfect. As you exhale, remember to relax your muscles and visualize pushing the fluid out. Keep up the good work!
You're inhaling through your nose and tightening your body well. Continue to visualize the fluid moving to your chest during this inhale phase.
Exhaling through your mouth and relaxing your muscles is excellent. Keep visualizing pushing fluid out as you exhale to maximize the lymphatic pumping action.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with your deep breathing exercises! Remember to tighten your whole body as you inhale and relax as you exhale. This helps move lymphatic fluid effectively.
